string-array.name: affirmations_array
string-array.item: This too shall pass
Just be
You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
It is what it is
You are right where you are supposed to be.
Life isn’t that happens to you, it’s how you react to what happens to you.
This too shall pass
Nothing good gets away
Whatever it takes, be yourself
Think of your best self and show up as them
Small smart decisions
What has been is not what will be
I am present in this moment, and this moment is enough
Breathe in peace, exhale stress
I am calm, centered, and focused
May I be kind to myself and others
I am grateful for this moment and all it offers
I let go of worries and trust in the universe
With each breath, I become more relaxed and at ease
I am a peaceful presence in the world
I accept what is and let go of what was
I choose to let go of negativity and embrace positivity
I am here, now, fully present and engaged
With every breath, I release tension and find peace
I trust in the wisdom of my body and mind
I am grateful for the small things in life that bring me joy
I let go of the past and embrace the present moment
I am open to the beauty and wonder of the world around me
I am at peace with myself and those around me
I am mindful of my thoughts, emotions, and actions
I trust in the journey of life and where it\'s taking me
I am grounded and rooted in the present moment
I am enough, just as I am
I cultivate patience and understanding with myself and others
I let go of judgments and embrace compassion
I am grateful for the lessons that come from each experience
I am calm and centered in the midst of chaos
I trust in my intuition and inner wisdom
I am open to change and growth
I focus on my breath and allow my thoughts to pass
I am kind to myself and practice self-compassion
I am mindful of my surroundings and the beauty of nature
I embrace the uncertainty of life with a sense of adventure
I find peace in the present moment, free from worry and anxiety
I am aware of my feelings and choose to respond with kindness and understanding
I am grateful for the abundance of love and support in my life
I trust in the process of life and the journey it takes me on
I am free from attachment to outcomes and trust in the flow of life
I find joy and beauty in simple moments
I am centered and grounded in my own inner peace
